description: This file defines the TranslatorService class responsible for translating between TMF-formatted requests/responses and the native Django application format. It contains methods for converting request payloads and response payloads, currently implemented as simple stubs.

classes.name: TranslatorService
classes.description: A service class that handles translation between TMF protocol formats and native Django application data structures.

methods.name: __init__(self, schema_loader)
methods.description: Initializes the TranslatorService with a schema loader dependency.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] tmf_to_native(self, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Translates a TMF request payload into the native format; currently a pass-through.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] native_to_tmf(self, resource: str, payload: Any)
methods.description: Translates a native payload into TMF format; wraps non-dict/list payloads.

ctags.name: native_to_tmf
ctags.pattern: /^    def native_to_tmf(self, resource: str, payload: Any) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: tmf_to_native
ctags.pattern: /^    def tmf_to_native(self, resource: str, payload: Dict[str, Any]) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
